call_title: Dev Update Feb 2nd 2025 |  Cornell AAP Brick, ChainCash, Miners Rights Protocol, Minotaur, and more!

decisions.decision: Proceed with Sigma 6.0 public testnet activation
decisions.speaker: Armeanio
decisions.context: All issues found in Sigma 6.0 have been fixed
decisions.quote: with Sigma, it looks like all issues found in Sigma 6.0 have been fixed. So we're going to proceed with the public test net activation.

decisions.decision: Down to one miner on testnet to make testing easy
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.quote: And we're down to one miner on test net, just to make it easy.

commitments.commitment: C8 Dexy Gold integration ETA a few weeks
commitments.quote: C8 with Dexy Gold integration, ETA, a few weeks.

commitments.commitment: Kushti will send Sigma 6.0 file today or tomorrow
commitments.quote: he's going to send me that file today or tomorrow, I think.

commitments.commitment: qx() will spin up Sigma 6.0 and mine to it for kushti's tests
commitments.quote: And I'm going to spin that 6.0 up and mine to it. And then he's going to do some tests.

commitments.commitment: Next is mainnet update for SigmaUSD Oracle Pool
Hashmon project launch end of February, beginning of March
commitments.timeline: end of February, beginning of March
commitments.quote: Looking to launch project end of February, beginning of March.

open_questions.question: Continue discussions about limits for SigmaUSD
open_questions.context: Part of SigmaUSD Oracle Pool mainnet update process

open_questions.question: Need to finalize tokenomics with C8 for Hashmon

reversals_or_updates.previous: Refund-related registers and actions in ChainCash
reversals_or_updates.reason: Refund can be replaced with note redemption
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts pool and DuckPools has an APY of 28.9%
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Bug showed up in Binance Smart Chain during Rosen testing
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Bug fix took a week to figure out, patch, and run end-to-end tests
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: SigmaUSD Oracle Pool coordinated test will drop down to four or maybe three Oracle members
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Cyberverse jumped from average of 40 users to about 100, now averaging 90-100 users at any given time
key_facts.speaker: qx()
